name: Echo Static
description: A hunched figure draped in layers of patched-up clothing, Echo's chrome is subtle but extensive - a neural implant glinting beneath his fringe, a modified optical lens over one eye, and wires snaking under the collar of his jacket. His gaze flickers between screens as he types furiously, fingers flying across the keys like spiders on glass.
dialogue: Don't even think about it.
Need something? Quick or I got work to do.
Yeah, that data costs credits.
You found a firewall? Lucky you. Most people don't.
My system's clean. Unless you know otherwise...
Got your eyes on me, cop-face?
Matrix bleed's getting worse, ain't it?
Don't tell anyone I helped you.
I can find anything... for the right price.
You got a fix? Let's talk.
Quiet! You'll spook them!
What do you want from me?
Heard you were looking for something...
That data is top secret, sweetheart.
Don't try that with me.
You gonna pay or what?
I need to know your full name.
The net's got eyes everywhere now.
This isn't safe. Let's move.
Need a backdoor? I can get you one.
They're watching us, kiddo...
That data is dangerous. You sure?
What do you mean 'nothing'? Everything leaves a trace!
I don't deal in favors. Credits only.
You owe me big time now.
My system's secure. Nothing can get through it.
Don't try to cheat me, alright?
The net is crawling with bots these days.
This data could be bad for you.
I don't like surveillance... but I need the money.
You got a scanner? Let me check your system.
That's some serious chrome you got there.
The more they try to control us, the stronger we become.
Don't look at me like that. You know how it is.
I gotta go... too much heat.
They found out about the leak?
Just stay low for a while...
This is gonna get messy.
You owe me another one, alright?
Don't forget what I did for you today.
I can always find someone else if you don't pay up.
That was a close one... too close.
Let's not make this a habit.
They know about me now, kiddo...
You gonna be alright?
Stay safe out there.
I can feel them watching us...

flavor.rationale: Echo Static operates in the Lower Sprawl district as a freelance hacker providing data access and system breaches for those desperate enough to pay. This location is perfect because of its high criminal activity, making it easier for him to blend in while also attracting clients seeking illicit information or services that wouldn't be available elsewhere. His presence adds an element of danger and unpredictability to the district, as he can both aid and hinder players depending on their actions.
